Intention.answer: to be determined by investigating authorities

Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: Illegal dumping of hazardous waste materials into the ocean by a commercial cargo ship with no visible identification markings, near Seagull Reef, 5 miles west of the coastline. Witnessed by the user, who reported concerns about potential harm to the marine ecosystem and fishing industry in the region. The user requests appropriate authorities to investigate and take necessary actions to prevent such violations in the future.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
